com.google.android.exoplayer2.drm

Class OfflineLicenseHelper<T extends ExoMediaCrypto>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer2.drm.OfflineLicenseHelper<T>

  • public final class OfflineLicenseHelper<T extends ExoMediaCrypto>
extends Object
    Helper class to download, renew and release offline licenses. It utilizes DefaultDrmSessionManager.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OfflineLicenseHelper(ExoMediaDrm<T> mediaDrm, MediaDrmCallback callback, HashMap<String,String> optionalKeyRequestParameters)
      Constructs an instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OfflineLicenseHelper

        public OfflineLicenseHelper(ExoMediaDrm<T> mediaDrm,
                            MediaDrmCallback callback,
                            HashMap<String,String> optionalKeyRequestParameters)
        Constructs an instance. Call releaseResources() when you're done with it.
        Parameters:
        mediaDrm - An underlying ExoMediaDrm for use by the manager.
        callback - Performs key and provisioning requests.
        optionalKeyRequestParameters - An optional map of parameters to pass as the last argument to MediaDrm.getKeyRequest(byte[], byte[], String, int, HashMap). May be null.
        See Also:
        DefaultDrmSessionManager.DefaultDrmSessionManager(java.util.UUID, ExoMediaDrm, MediaDrmCallback, HashMap, Handler, EventListener)

    • Method Detail

      • downloadManifest

        public static DashManifest downloadManifest(HttpDataSource dataSource,
                                            String manifestUriString)
                                     throws IOException
        Helper method to download a DASH manifest.
        Parameters:
        dataSource - The HttpDataSource from which the manifest should be read.
        manifestUriString - The URI of the manifest to be read.
        Returns:
        An instance of DashManifest.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurs reading data from the stream.
        See Also:
        DashManifestParser

      • newWidevineInstance

        public static OfflineLicenseHelper<FrameworkMediaCrypto> newWidevineInstance(String licenseUrl,
                                                                             HttpDataSource.Factory httpDataSourceFactory)
                                                                      throws UnsupportedDrmException
        Instantiates a new instance which uses Widevine CDM. Call releaseResources() when you're done with the helper instance.
        Parameters:
        licenseUrl - The default license URL.
        httpDataSourceFactory - A factory from which to obtain HttpDataSource instances.
        Returns:
        A new instance which uses Widevine CDM.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedDrmException - If the Widevine DRM scheme is unsupported or cannot be instantiated.

      • newWidevineInstance

        public static OfflineLicenseHelper<FrameworkMediaCrypto> newWidevineInstance(MediaDrmCallback callback,
                                                                             HashMap<String,String> optionalKeyRequestParameters)
                                                                      throws UnsupportedDrmException
        Instantiates a new instance which uses Widevine CDM. Call releaseResources() when you're done with the helper instance.
        Parameters:
        callback - Performs key and provisioning requests.
        optionalKeyRequestParameters - An optional map of parameters to pass as the last argument to MediaDrm.getKeyRequest(byte[], byte[], String, int, HashMap). May be null.
        Returns:
        A new instance which uses Widevine CDM.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedDrmException - If the Widevine DRM scheme is unsupported or cannot be instantiated.
        See Also:
        DefaultDrmSessionManager.DefaultDrmSessionManager(java.util.UUID, ExoMediaDrm, MediaDrmCallback, HashMap, Handler, EventListener)

      • releaseResources

        public void releaseResources()
        Releases the used resources.

      • download

        public byte[] download(HttpDataSource dataSource,
                       String manifestUriString)
                throws IOException,
                       InterruptedException,
                       DrmSession.DrmSessionException
        Downloads an offline license.
        Parameters:
        dataSource - The HttpDataSource to be used for download.
        manifestUriString - The URI of the manifest to be read.
        Returns:
        The downloaded offline license key set id.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurs reading data from the stream.
        InterruptedException - If the thread has been interrupted.
        DrmSession.DrmSessionException - Thrown when there is an error during DRM session.

      • download

        public byte[] download(HttpDataSource dataSource,
                       DashManifest dashManifest)
                throws IOException,
                       InterruptedException,
                       DrmSession.DrmSessionException
        Downloads an offline license.
        Parameters:
        dataSource - The HttpDataSource to be used for download.
        dashManifest - The DashManifest of the DASH content.
        Returns:
        The downloaded offline license key set id.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurs reading data from the stream.
        InterruptedException - If the thread has been interrupted.
        DrmSession.DrmSessionException - Thrown when there is an error during DRM session.

      • renew

        public byte[] renew(byte[] offlineLicenseKeySetId)
             throws DrmSession.DrmSessionException
        Renews an offline license.
        Parameters:
        offlineLicenseKeySetId - The key set id of the license to be renewed.
        Returns:
        Renewed offline license key set id.
        Throws:
        DrmSession.DrmSessionException - Thrown when there is an error during DRM session.

      • release

        public void release(byte[] offlineLicenseKeySetId)
             throws DrmSession.DrmSessionException
        Releases an offline license.
        Parameters:
        offlineLicenseKeySetId - The key set id of the license to be released.
        Throws:
        DrmSession.DrmSessionException - Thrown when there is an error during DRM session.

      • getLicenseDurationRemainingSec

        public Pair<Long,Long> getLicenseDurationRemainingSec(byte[] offlineLicenseKeySetId)
                                               throws DrmSession.DrmSessionException
        Returns license and playback durations remaining in seconds of the given offline license.
        Parameters:
        offlineLicenseKeySetId - The key set id of the license.
        Throws:
        DrmSession.DrmSessionException
